abstract: Russell Crowe and Russell Boyd discuss working on Peter Weir's, 'Master and Commander: the far side of the world.'
description: Margaret Pomeranz interviews cinematographer Russell Boyd and actor Russell Crowe about working on the film 'Master and Commander: the far side of the world', directed by fellow Australian Peter Weir. This collaboration illustrates the importance of maintaining a strong local film industry to both take Australian film-makers overseas and inspire future generations.
